entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who is thrilled that McLaggen messed up badly. He is also described as having a note of badly suppressed glee in his voice and shaking with laughter.

entities.name: mclaggen
entities.description: McLaggen is mentioned as the one who messed up badly, causing Ron to be thrilled.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who was unconscious and had his skull mended. He is also described as being angry.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as a potential commentator for the match.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as someone who came to visit Harry while he was unconscious.

relationships.description: Ron is thrilled that McLaggen messed up badly.
Ginny came to visit Harry while he was unconscious.
